EmailTemplate.description: Quote inquiry - new portal account setup required
EmailTemplate.name: Quote Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Please note we have shifted from an email-based quoting system to an easy, fast portal-based system.
Before you can submit your online quote request, you will need to set up a portal account by simply log into the MyAerospace.com portal and register as a new user. When your account is ready, you will receive an email confirmation to start using this system.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
